description: This file defines the NoteRepository class, which provides an API for managing notes, including creating, updating, deleting, retrieving, and listing notes in the application. It interacts with a note DAO backed by a local SQLite database.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class providing data access operations for notes, encapsulating interactions with the DAO and database.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with the specified title and content, sets timestamps, and inserts it into the database.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with new title and content, and updates the timestamp.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by its id.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its id.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all notes, optionally filtering by a search query.
